dnsLookupFields.title: DNS lookup field(s)
dnsLookupFields.description: List of field names to perform DNS lookup for.

inFieldName.title: Lookup field name
inFieldName.description: Name of the field to lookup.

resourceRecordType.title: Resource record type
resourceRecordType.description: The DNS record type (RR) to return. Defaults to 'A'.

outFieldName.title: Output field name
outFieldName.description: Name of field to add lookup result(s) to. Leave blank to overwrite the lookup field.

reverseLookupFields.title: Reverse DNS lookup field(s)
reverseLookupFields.description: List of field names to perform reverse DNS lookup for.

inFieldName.title: Lookup field name
inFieldName.description: Name of the field containing the IP to look up. If the field value is not in ipv4 or ipv6 format, the lookup is skipped.

outFieldName.title: Output field name
outFieldName.description: Name of field to add the resolved domain to. Leave blank to overwrite the lookup field.

dnsServers.title: DNS server(s) overrides
dnsServers.description: IP(s), in RFC 5952 format, of the DNS server(s) to use for resolution. E.g. IPv4 1.1.1.1, 4.2.2.2:53, or IPv6 [2001:4860:4860::8888], [2001:4860:4860::8888]:1053. If not specified, system's DNS will be used.

cacheTTL.title: Reload period (minutes)
cacheTTL.description: Interval at which to refresh DNS cache. Use 0 to disable.

maxCacheSize.title: Maximum cache size
maxCacheSize.description: The maximum number of DNS resolutions to be cached locally. Leave at default, unless you understand the implications of changing.
